description: Observation well metadata for Champaign County.

columns.name: WELL_NAME
columns.meaning: Local ISWS name for the observation well.

columns.name: WELL_NAME_ALT
columns.meaning: Alternate ISWS name for the observation well.

columns.name: P_NUMBER
columns.meaning: Unique ISWS identifier for the observation well.

columns.name: API
columns.meaning: American Petroleum Institute identifier for the observation well.

columns.name: STATON_ID
columns.meaning: ID linking to the monitoring well station table.

columns.name: NESTED_FLAG
columns.meaning: Flag indicating if part of a nested observation site.

columns.name: NESTED_WITH_1
columns.meaning: The P_Number of the well located next to it.

columns.name: NESTED_WITH_2
columns.meaning: The P_Number of another nearby well (if any).

columns.name: NESTED_DESCRIPTION
columns.meaning: Description of well location relative to its nested counterpart.

columns.name: NETWORK_1
columns.meaning: Name of the primary monitoring network.

columns.name: NETWORK_2
columns.meaning: Name of the secondary monitoring network.

columns.name: MANAGED_BY
columns.meaning: Name of entity that maintains the monitoring station.

columns.name: SPONSOR_MONITORING
columns.meaning: Entity that pays to monitor the well.

columns.name: SPONSOR_DRILLING
columns.meaning: Entity that paid to drill the well.

columns.name: AQ_CLASS
columns.meaning: Major geologic system monitored by the well.

columns.name: LOCAL_AQ_NAME
columns.meaning: Local aquifer name monitored by the well.

columns.name: UPPER_GEOLOGIC_DESC
columns.meaning: Upper geologic unit that the well is open to.

columns.name: LOWER_GEOLOGIC_DESC
columns.meaning: Lower geologic unit that the well is open to.

columns.name: AQ_TYPE
columns.meaning: Whether the well monitors an unconfined, confined, or perched aquifer.

columns.name: NGWMN_FLAG
columns.meaning: Flag indicating membership in the USGS National Groundwater Monitoring Network.

columns.name: TRANSDUCER_FLAG
columns.meaning: Flag indicating if the well currently has a pressure transducer installed.

columns.name: TELEMETRY_SITE
columns.meaning: Flag indicating if the well reports in real-time via telemetry.

columns.name: MEASUREMENT_FREQ
columns.meaning: Description of whether the well is measured continuously or periodically.

columns.name: SENSOR_PSI
columns.meaning: Pressure range of the pressure transducer in PSI.

columns.name: SENSOR_MODEL
columns.meaning: Model number of the pressure transducer installed.

columns.name: SENSOR_SERIAL
columns.meaning: Serial number of the pressure transducer installed.

columns.name: CABLE_LENGTH
columns.meaning: Length of cable on the pressure transducer.

columns.name: NOTES
columns.meaning: Additional notes about the observation well.
